comment: Старика убили, его союзник / мирный исход

languages.text: "Бедный-бедный старик... А ведь я ему говорил!"

traits.locale_text: "Бедный-бедный старик... А ведь я ему говорил!"

languages.text: "Poor, poor old man... I tried to talk him out of it!"
languages.original_text: "Бедный-бедный старик... А ведь я ему говорил!"

traits.locale_text: "Poor, poor old man... I tried to talk him out of it!"
"Poor, poor old man... I tried to talk him out of it!"
"Poor, poor old man... I tried to talk him out of it!"
"Poor, poor old man... I tried to talk him out of it!"
"Poor, poor old man... I tried to talk him out of it!"
"Poor, poor old man... I tried to talk him out of it!"

languages.text: "Armer, armer alter Mann ... Ich habe versucht, ihn davon abzubringen!"
languages.original_text: "Poor, poor old man... I tried to talk him out of it!"

traits.locale_text: "Armer, armer alter Mann ... Ich habe versucht, ihn davon abzubringen!"

languages.text: « Le pauvre... J'ai pourtant tout fait pour le dissuader ! »
languages.original_text: "Poor, poor old man... I tried to talk him out of it!"

traits.locale_text: « Le pauvre... J'ai pourtant tout fait pour le dissuader ! »

languages.text: “噢，可怜的老家伙啊……我已经劝过他了！”
languages.original_text: "Poor, poor old man... I tried to talk him out of it!"

traits.locale_text: “噢，可怜的老家伙啊……我已经劝过他了！”

languages.text: 「かわいそうに、哀れな爺さんだ…やめるように言ったのに！」
languages.original_text: "Poor, poor old man... I tried to talk him out of it!"

traits.locale_text: 「かわいそうに、哀れな爺さんだこと…私はやめるように言ったのに！」

languages.original_text: "Poor, poor old man... I tried to talk him out of it!"
"Poor, poor old man... I tried to talk him out of it!"

traits.locale_text: "Zavallı ihtiyar... Onu ikna etmeye de çalıştım!"
